name: TC-12-P :: Create a new Customer Account

actions.action: Click the "Customers" link in the back-office main menu.
Click the "Customers" link in the submenu.
actions.expectedResult: The customer list page is displayed correctly.
A new page for creating a new customer appears.

actions.action: Enter the customer's "First name" and "Last name".
actions.expectedResult: The customer's name is entered in the fields.
The password is set for the account.
A "Successful creation" message is displayed at the top of the page.
